sense.def:
A route
je pot od enega kraja do drugega.

seg.quote: I took the route through Beechwood.
...the main route out of London to the west.

sense.def:
A route
je tudi način, kako lahko nekaj dosežemo.

seg.quote: Another route is by active participation in a trade union.

sense.def:
Kadar vozila
are routed past a place or through a place
, morajo peljati mimo določenega kraja ali skozenj.

seg.quote: Flights were being routed around the trouble area.
